title: #119: The Conspiracy Synergy Effect | Teace Snyder
description:
Canadian researcher and artist, Teace Snyder, has been making visual representations of the crazy world in which we are living in for many years. His art captures where society is right now and how weird things have gotten.

Lately, Teace has been hard at work with his new podcast called Conspiracy Synergy where he breaks down the cultural implications of the new Woke culture, the medical mafia, and what the impact is for humanity.

Teace Snyder takes a light-hearted approach to some very serious topics, and he brings a sense of humor to this insanity that is missing and desperately needed.
